quest.name: Revenge of the Furred
journal: As is his wont, 789th Order Pickman Gi Gu is fretting and fidgeting.

A visibly harried Gi Gu stammers to you some incoherent babbling about his beloved Bi Bi urging him to flee the dig. Pressed for a reason, Gi Gu confesses that he was too frightened to ask. Seek out Bi Bi for yourself and see what is amiss.

Bi Bi had only begun to reveal the latest plan of the scheming Zo Ga when the ever-intimidating 13th Order Fugleman came storming to the scene. Enraged at all those plotting against him, he accosted Bi Bi, demanding that she lend her alchemical prowess to his odious plot. Speak with Gi Gu─who is unlikely to offer any constructive advice─and decide on a course of action.

A rousing rally from Lieutenant Skaetswys has seemingly instilled Gi Gu with the courage to strike back at Zo Ga's oppression. The operation will require a healthy quantity of explosives, which you have agreed to procure from the alchemist Ba Go in the labor-shy Gi Gu's stead.

The eccentric Ba Go, concerned about little more than seeing things go boom, has entrusted to you a veritable arsenal of bombs for the assault on U'Ghamaro. Infiltrate the mines and set limpet bombs at suitable locations.
The first set of bombs has been successfully placed. Report to Lieutenant Skaetswys for further instructions.
Your task continues. Head deeper into the mines and place three more limpet bombs while Skaetswys stands on the lookout for Zo Ga's men.
You have succeeded in placing the remaining bombs. Inform Skaetswys that the deed is done.

With the groundwork for the operation successfully laid, Skaetswys suggests that you pay a visit to the 13th Order workshop to ensure that Gi Gu holds up his end of the agreement. Speak again with the lieutenant, who stands before the workshop's front door.
You have successfully infiltrated the workshop, yet it appears Gi Gu is taking his precious time with his duties. Seek him out and give him a word or two of encouragement.

For the first time since you met him─if not in his entire life─789th Order Pickman Gi Gu has followed through on his word. With the final bomb set directly on Zo Ga's prized furnace, you and your comrades can take your leave. Speak with Lieutenant Skaetswys by the workshop exit.

When your escape from the workshop was intercepted, the heretofore–hapless 789th Order Pickman Gi Gu summoned a measure of courage from gods–know–where, defeating the formidable 13th Order Fugleman Zo Ga and sending all present into a state of utter disbelief in the process. Return to the 789th Order Dig and congratulate the unlikely hero on his startling victory.

Instilled with courage from his victory over his longtime oppressor, 789th Order Pickman Gi Gu has vowed to channel his newfound strength into leading his kobolds into a new age of prosperity─after he indulges in a well-deserved rest, of course. Despite lingering doubts, Lieutenant Skaetswys expresses her relief at this turn of events, and encourages you to deliver news of your success to Lieutenant Trachraet in Limsa.

Lieutenant Trachraet applauds your efforts in the Kobold Dig on behalf of Maelstrom. With Zo Ga removed from power and the 789th poised to rise to a position of influence, the day that Lominsans and kobolds live in peace may not be as far off as once thought.
objectives: Speak with 175th Order Alchemist Bi Bi at the 789th Order Dig.
Speak with 789th Order Pickman Gi Gu.
Speak with 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
Set limpet bombs at the specified locations in U'Ghamaro Mines.
Speak with Skaetswys in U'Ghamaro Mines.
Set additional limpet bombs at the specified locations in U'Ghamaro Mines.
Speak with Skaetswys in U'Ghamaro Mines.
Speak with Skaetswys at the entrance to the 13th Order workshop.
Speak with 789th Order Pickman Gi Gu.
Speak with Gi Gu at the 789th Order Dig.
Report to Trachraet at Maelstrom Command in Limsa Lominsa.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Aiyeeeeee! We must flee this place, adventurer─run, dash, flee for our lives!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Why? Because Bi Bi said so, and dare I disobey my dear Bi Bi again? No, no, I dare not.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Why must we flee? She tried to tell me, but I was too horrified to listen─terrified, petrified, horrified! If you would know more, find her and ask yourself. I will be holding my paws over my ears. Yes, yes, I will.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: It is not like my Bi Bi to panic so. No, no, it is rare indeed. Whatever has happened, it must be dire─grim, dreadful, dire!

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: Adventurer! D-Did you not flee with Gi Gu!? You must leave this place. No, no, it is not safe for─

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: Eeek!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Well, well...looky what we have here. Stragglers, eh─laggards, strayers, stragglers...

dialogue.name: KOBOLDGALA01321
dialogue.text: (-Comely Kobold Lass-)Ewww, a hairless one! Just looking at herhim makes me want to retch─gag, heave, retch!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Bi Bi. I warned you what would happen if you betrayed me, but did you listen? No, no, you didn't...

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Forename! Are ye─ <gulp> This doesn't look good...

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Z-Zo Ga, please listen─hear, hark, listen!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Gi Gu! You and your mangy lot weren't content with a bunch of spongers─leeches, scroungers, spongers. No, no, you would drag down your betters to your sorry standing.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: N-No, Zo Ga! No, no, this is not so!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Shut your maw! I see the adventurer standing beside you. You are a traitor to the tunnels─a turncoat, a treasonist, a traitor!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Please, Zo Ga! I...I only wanted to go home!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Oh, I have a new home for you. Yes, yes, I do... It's cozy, and oh-so-warm─scorching, scalding, warm. Yes, you'll make fine fuel for our flames...

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: Zo Ga! Have mercy─

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: You disappoint me, Bi Bi. Yes, yes, you do. By my side, you could have had power and riches beyond your wildest dreams. Yet you cast your lot with this weakling─this sop, this doormat, this weakling.

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: Please, Zo Ga! I will do anything you say! Yes, yes, anything at all! Just spare poor Gi Gu's life!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Bi Bi! No, no, you must not!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Anything, you say? Anything at all...? Now here's an astute girl─smart, sharp, astute. Zo Ga can find a job for you. Yes, yes, I can...

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: A skilled alchemist, you are. Yes, yes, and quite the looker, too. You will slave in my workshop by day and keep me warm by night. Yes, you will.

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: And if I ever catch you slacking off, I'll feed you to the furnace and blast your whole order into the sea. Bwahahaha!

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: Gi Gu... Promise you will come for me─swear, vow, promise...?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Bi Bi! Bi Biiiiii! <sniff>

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: That Zo Ga... Talk about gettin' too big for yer britches. Still, I fear for the kobold lass's well-bein'...

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Bi Bi! This is unfair─unreasonable, unjust, unfair!

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: And it's yer bloody fault as much as anyone's! If ye moved yer legs and paws 'alf as much as ye do yer mouth, maybe ye could 'ave saved the girl from 'er fate.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Bi Bi... <sniff> You speak true─verily, assuredly, true. At last─long, long last─I see the error of my ways. Yes, to save his love, Gi Gu will follow wherever you go.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Finally, yer talkin' some sense! Now, round up yer best men─we're off to U'Ghamaro to take the battle to Zo Ga.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: What!? Y-You cannot be serious. This is madness─craziness, lunacy, madness!

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: “Follow wherever ye go,” eh!? Bloody worthless, ye are! What in the seven 'ells does Bi Bi even see in ye!?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: B-But...you do not understand... No, no, you do not see. Round up my best men? No, no...no kobold will follow a leader as pathetic as me. I am alone─helpless, hopeless, alone.

dialogue.name: BOZU
dialogue.text: It is you who speaks madness, Gi Gu─craziness, lunacy, madness. You know nothing. No, no, nothing at all.

dialogue.name: BOBU
dialogue.text: Listen to us, Gi Gu. Yes, yes, listen well. We are with you─we have always been with you.

dialogue.name: BOGU
dialogue.text: Bo Zu and Bo Bu speak true. Are we jealous of Bi Bi's love for you? Yes, yes, we are. But you are our leader, and you have always led us well. Wherever you go, we will follow faithfully─dutifully, loyally, faithfully.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Bo Zu... Bo Bu... Bo Gu... But I am...I am─

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Yer the leader of the 789th, that's what ye are, and it's 'igh time ye bloody acted the part! Yer friends are countin' on ye, and Bi Bi all the more so! The choice is yers to make─now, what do ye say!?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: I...I will go. Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, YES! Just wait, my precious Bi Bi─Gi Gu is coming to save you!

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Music to my bloody ears! I guess men─er, kobolds─can change, after all.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Now listen up! Forename and I will storm U'Ghamaro from the fore and create a diversion. Gi Gu─ye'll sneak into the workshop the back way and put Zo Ga's new furnace out of commission. Yer fruitcake of a friend Ba Go should be able to furnish us with the tools for the task, aye?

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Amidst all the smoke and clatter, we'll find Bi Bi and return 'er to safety. Now listen, Gi Gu─Forename and I stand with ye, but this is yer battle. The life and livelihood of you, yer friends, and yer love─it's all in yer grubby paws. Got it? Good! Now let's hear yer battle cry!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: <gulp> I... I... Mammyyyyyyyyy! F-Forgive me. You will speak to Ba Go for me, yes? I need a moment to reflect─meditate, contemplate, reflect.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: You will go to Ba Go and ask him to ready our tools, yes? I need a moment to gather my strength─my courage, my power, my strength.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Looks like our words finally got through to gutless ol' Gi Gu. It's about bloody time, I say!

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Ready yerself, Forename─there'll be some fireworks in U'Ghamaro tonight. Aye, I've been waitin' for a mission like this ever since I joined the Maelstrom.

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: You and Gi Gu will make things go boom? Make mayhem─madness, massacre, mayhem? Ba Go will help. Oh, yesss, yesss, he will!

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: Ba Go will give you the biggest, burstingest of Ba Go's beauties. They make very big booms, they do. Yesss, yesss, indeed!

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: Zo Ga's workshop...no, no, not just his workshop. All of U'Ghamaro will be reduced to rubble─wreckage, ruin, rubble!

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: You will distract Zo Ga's lackeys, help Gi Gu do his deed, yes? Ba Go has a present for you as well─a gift, a boon, a present.

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: Take these lovely, lovely little ones. Their size may be trifling, but do not be fooled. No, no. Set them off in succession, and they will make lovely, lovely sparks. Yesss, yesss, they will.

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: Ba Go has waited long, long for this day. You will take my lovelies and make big booms and blasts? Make U'Ghamaro go boom, yes?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Gi Gu has been thinking─pondering, contemplating, thinking. Maybe we can just call this off and stay home, stay safe? No, no, we can't?

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Ye've brought the bombs, aye, Forename? Good! Let's begin. Ye've got more experience 'andlin' these things than I, so I'll leave the technical side to you. I'll keep lookout for Zo Ga and 'is scurvy 'enchmen.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Aye, that should do the trick 'round 'ere. Now to delve a bit deeper. Follow me!

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: I'll keep watch, just as before. When yer done plantin' the bombs, ye just say the word.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Looks like our job 'ere is done. The rest is up to Gi Gu─a right 'orrifyin' thought, that.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Zo Ga's workshop lies right beyond this door, and I've already taken the liberty of knockin' out the doorman and relievin' 'im of 'is key. Let's 'op to it, then, eh, Forename?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Enter the 13th Order workshop?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Adventurer! You have come to see Gi Gu do his job, yes? Yes, behold─gaze, regard, behold!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Ah, that should do it, probably...possibly...maybe? You are proud of Gi Gu, yes? Yes, yes, you should be!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Oh, if only Bi Bi could see me now! Yes, she would be smitten─swooning, struck, smitten!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Wh-What was that noise!? Oh, adventurer, we must flee─run, fly, flee─before scary, scary Zo Ga finds us!

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: What's keepin' that bloody Gi Gu!? That worthless pile o' shite best 'ave found the furnace. 'Cause if 'e's off cowerin' in some corner instead...

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: That craven kobold did 'is job, eh? It's a bloody miracle! Now let's get out of 'ere before the whole place comes tumblin' down.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Leave the 13th Order workshop?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: No.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Gi Gu's job is done. Now, we must leave before Zo Ga returns or we are dead for sure─doomed, deceased, dead!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Back to the dig! Yes, quickly, swiftly, briskly!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Gi Guuuuuu! I will crush you─smash you, squash you, crush you!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: In all my years, I have never suffered such indignity! You are finished, Gi Gu! Yes, yes, your bones will feed my furnace!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Stand back, adventurer. No, no, no further.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: This is... This is my battle─my fight, my struggle, my battle.

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Feel the pain, Gi Gu! The hurt...the suffering...the pain!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Ow! Ow! Have mercy, Zo Ga. Yes, yes, have mercy!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: There will be no mercy for you, Gi Gu! No, no, not ever! You will feel the full brunt of my wrath─my anger, my rage, my wrath!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Zo... <heave> Ga... <cough> P-Please...

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Die─perish, croak, die─like the worthless dreg you are!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Zo... Ga...

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: A sucker for punishment, eh? Yes, yes, you are...

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: Zo Ga! Please stop this─I beg you, beseech you, implore you!

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: Gi Gu has suffered enough. Yes, yes, he has.

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: You are strong, Zo Ga. Yes, strong and skilled with the pick. You should be leading us to greater heights! Why waste your strength on poor, weak Gi Gu!?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: <cough> ...Silent...

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: ...be...silent...

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: Gi Gu...?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Yes, yes, be silent! Shut up! Close your bloody maw!

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Gi Gu?

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Gi Gu...?

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: (-Everyone-)Gi Gu!?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Stand back! Hands off! Get lost! Yes, yes, all of you! I never asked for your help─no, no, not a one of you! This is Gi Gu's battle!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: See this, Zo Ga? Yes, yes, you do! This is Ba Go's life's work─his magnum opus! It brims with the power to blast you and the whole 13th Order into dust─debris, detritus, dust!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: This is for all those years of oppression─insult, abuse, oppression! Yes, yes, Zo Ga...you have walked over Gi Gu for the last time!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Zo Gaaaaaa! I'll see you, see you in the seventh hell!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Wh-What!? Gi Gu, what have you...!?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Gaaaaaaaaahhhhhh!!!

dialogue.name: ZOGA
dialogue.text: Urk─!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: I'm finished─done, complete, finished.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Thank you, my friends─my comrades, my allies, my friends. It is you─yes, yes, all of you─who gave me the courage to fight that battle. Yes, a battle I should have fought long ago.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Hahaha! I 'ad me doubts, I must admit, but I'm 'appy to say ye proved me wrong. And you, Forename─this wouldn't 'ave been possible without ye.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: With Zo Ga out of the way, the kobolds of U'Ghamaro should quiet down─a development which should please Commander Bloeidin and the Red Swallows. Spent more time in those tunnels than I'd 'ave liked, but all's well that ends well.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Bi Bi! You have come! You are proud of me, yes? Yes, yes, what do you think of your Gi Gu now!?

dialogue.name: BIBI
dialogue.text: You...you are horrible─terrible, miserable, horrible! I've never been told such hurtful things─no, no, never! What happened to the sweet Gi Gu I used to know!? Good-bye, Gi Gu...<sniff>...farewell...

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: I cannot win. No, no, not with her.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: But do not worry about Gi Gu─do not fret, do not fuss, do not worry.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Yes, for my battle with Zo Ga has given me new courage─strength, confidence, courage.

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: I will win back Bi Bi's heart, yes. I will increase our productivity a hundredfold. I will not rest─slack, slumber, rest─until the 789th becomes the 1st!

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: I will do all this─yes, all this and more! Yes, yes...<yawn>...as soon as I awake from my nap.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: ...Perhaps I spoke too soon. Anyroad, there's little more that we can do, Forename. I'll stop off at Camp Overlook. Would ye mind goin' on ahead to Maelstrom Command?

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Aye, the Red Swallows should be right pleased to 'ear of Zo Ga's demise. I'll deliver the news to Commander Bloeidin. In the meantime, what say ye to reportin' back to Maelstrom Command?

dialogue.name: GIGU
dialogue.text: Gi Gu is relieved that the battle is over─at ease, at peace, relieved. Yes, yes, I think it is time for a well-deserved rest...

dialogue.name: TRACHRAET
dialogue.text: [GC Rank] SurnameForename! I feared we'd lost ye to the tunnels.

dialogue.name: TRACHRAET
dialogue.text: To think that a single missin' shipment would lead ye on such a circuitous journey through the bowels of U'Ghamaro. I shudder at the thought.

dialogue.name: TRACHRAET
dialogue.text: And yet, though there is still a long road ahead, I daresay yer efforts 'ave gone far in leadin' us down the path o' peace with the kobolds.

dialogue.name: TRACHRAET
dialogue.text: Aye, ye've done Limsa proud this day, my friend─accept this as remuneration for yer deeds. On behalf of the Maelstrom and the Admiral 'erself, I commend ye!

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Never 'ad much of a fondness for kobolds, but after gettin' to know the little buggers better, I must say they're not all 'alf bad. Aye, there may be 'ope for an understandin' between our peoples yet... Mind ye, I wouldn't 'old me breath waitin'.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Trusted reputation with the 789th Order.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from the 789th Order vendor.

dialogue.name: SKAETSWYS
dialogue.text: Zo Ga's workshop is just beyond this door. Come, Forename─we'd best go and make sure Gi Gu isn't off cowerin' in a corner somewhere.
